page.title: 07Religion
page.content: {The Priory Church}is the only place of worship in this block. The Nave of the old Priory has always been the church for{Bolton Abbey Parish.}It has recently been restored. There is a large congregation on Sunday mornings, most people come from Harrogate, Skipton, Ilkley, Addingham, and other places. There used to be a{Methodist chapel} in{Halton East}that closed 6 years ago. There was a{Church of England {Mission Room}in Halton East that closed 7 years ago.{The Methodist {Church for Bolton Abbey}is outside this block on the A59 road to Harrogate.
